html:
3.13.20  1:29 pm   What do I do now that my schools closed due to corona?

     see if you can learn everything in the world, before the school re opens

3.13.20  1:10 pm   What is impossible?

     everything, at first, and then gradually less things

3.13.20  12:29 pm   who is our lord and saviour?

     each other

3.13.20  12:07 pm   Hi Bill, do you think the world is getting better at doing the right things? Because I have a sneaking suspicion that it might be.

     i agree with you

3.13.20  11:43 am   question: what is life in your opinion?

     the most ridiculous thing ever

3.13.20  11:36 am   i was freed early from quarantine due to no signs of sickness whatsoever but somehow, i still feel depressed and dead inside when i should be relieved. do you have any tips on how to cheer myself up?

     i think a perfect starting place right now is some very long walks

3.13.20  11:22 am   thoughts on ukuleles

     i prefer the ones that are tuned in order from low to high

3.13.20  11:21 am   Is it okay to enjoy racist wax cylinder music

     well, at first it will be fine because you won't be able to understand any of the lyrics. but then when you find out what they are you might start to feel a little uncomfortable

3.13.20  11:19 am   Is dinner over?

     yes, but ............................................. it will be back

3.13.20  11:16 am   Is an intire school one room?

     they used to be, in the old days

3.13.20  10:47 am   Are you doing ok?

     yes

     I hope so

3.13.20  10:00 am   salmon or shortbread?

peanuts or pepperoni?

     that's ridiculous. all those things are the same

3.13.20  9:55 am   What's corona virus for?

     one thing it can do is it reveals any potential weaknesses in our global pandemic response systems, so they can be improved and strengthened for next time

3.13.20  9:00 am   Is the corona virus affecting your projects

     i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no

3.13.20  8:42 am   do you have the coronavirus?

     not that i know of. but who knows ............. that thing is sneaky

3.13.20  8:35 am   do you want to ride on my blimp?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.13.20  8:22 am   do you think i should go to africa and find soap in the jungle since it's running out everywhere because people think it's the apocalypse

     no

3.13.20  8:21 am   is life real?

     oh that would explain a lot

3.13.20  8:03 am   are you going to do anything on april 31st

     no

3.13.20  7:56 am   Are you working on something huge?

     i am working on something extremely normal sized. i am preparing to flood the world with normalcy

3.13.20  7:52 am   what is the universe

     it's you

3.13.20  7:28 am   What if squirrels were something else?

     then something else may be what squirrels currently are

3.13.20  7:22 am   fav music

     ~terrible~

3.13.20  7:19 am   How would you define a god?

     it's everything

3.13.20  6:55 am   what's your favorite, am or pm?

     i think i know of a glorious way to combine them together

3.13.20  6:42 am   when will humanity go extinct? 

     maybe some other time

3.13.20  6:21 am   what is your favourite lunch meal?

     MOSTLY CABBAGE, HOW ABOUT

3.13.20  6:05 am   Can you change our life through the days gone by?

     no, it would have to be through the present, and future

3.13.20  6:04 am   Do you think you'd be a good history teacher?

     i have demonstrated my history teachings online. you can be the judge

3.13.20  4:13 am   What do you think of the letter A?

     good strong letter. good for yelling, or screaming

3.13.20  4:09 am   Hello have you ever felt before? Not like the feelings that you feel all the time, but something more "felty"

I have felt your shirts and request more of them, perhaps bring back old designs for I haven't felt a trees one yet


How are you feeling as well, assuming you have felt before.

I will check back posthaste asuming you've felt. Maybe you have cymbal felt

     i am a feltsmith, and have been for quite some time

3.13.20  4:06 am   i might have suddenly become addicted to doing extreme workouts every day as compensation for my general fear about the world's complexity. im loving it. im looking more and more fit, i am feeling sexier than ever. and im terrified that the high from this will wear off -- that working out will go back to being boring and awful and then it will be harder to look the way i do now, which i love. bill, i feel like im ping ponging around and just trying to escape all the falling rocks. how to i fucking STAPLE DOWN things i want to stay the same? how to i use my willpower to make my life exactly what i want it to be...

if you have any other extraneous advice in response to my situation, i'd love to hear it. take care.

     you already said you are addicted to what you are doing and loving it. that is the best possible recipe for doing that thing

3.13.20  4:03 am   is fearing new things... good?

     it's ok

3.13.20  3:56 am   personal opinion on spaghetti?

     it is linear

3.13.20  3:20 am   how the hell do you make video ideas

     you just have to imagine something. the hard part is making the video from it

3.13.20  3:14 am   What's left of the new song(s)/content right now?

     hundreds of songs and song ideas, and video ideas, barrels and heaps of vivid inspiration every day, and much innovation still needed in order to ever catch up to them. it's always been like this

3.13.20  2:43 am   Whats the difference between an apple?

     one is the same

3.13.20  2:19 am   For my english exam, I'll need to talk about a songtext.

     what the heck is a songtext

      I chose the song song. Do you have any suggestions on what to say or do you want to share any meanings hidden in the lyrics?

     oh no, i think i just found out what you are doing. you are taking the words of a song and removing it completely from the music or any way that the song actually sounds. i do not recommend or appreciate this

     Your help would be very much appriciated.

     songs are audio/music. if you are looking for text/words only, please use the notebook, or maybe even the questions page, but NOT the songs page

3.13.20  1:30 am   20 seconds into your "and the day goes on" music video, there's this black, white, and gray border at the top of the screen. is this a bug?

     i'm not sure what you mean, but no it is not a bug

3.13.20  1:10 am   do squirrels make sound?

     no, but they may have very loud nuts

3.13.20  12:45 am   do you sometimes cringe when people watch your videos in front of you?

     i am usually able to make a swift escape

3.13.20  12:43 am   what is your opinion on the letter h

     very good

3.13.20  12:42 am   favourite chord?

     if you don't let me use different chords at different times, i will rise in protest

3.12.20  11:49 pm   Found your channel yesterday and it made me feel for the first time in a long time.

     holy campsfredshire, what a kind display of friendsmanship

     How did you get your start as a musician,

     i don't remember

      and what might you recommend to someone who's started down that path?

     no need for recommendation, music recommends itself. at least that's how it has always been for me

3.12.20  11:37 pm   I have a lot of project ideas, but can't start any of them because I feel like I'm never going to finish them. How do I force myself out of the comfort of having a bunch of potentially good ideas and into the struggle of creating things?

     try shorter projects. if that doesn't work, i have a backup solution, which is to try even shorter projects

3.12.20  11:33 pm   what's the difference between the music you usually put out and the music from the "bill wurtz band"?

     that has been a designation i have sometimes used when the video shows me performing the music as drums, bass, keyboards, vocals, etc, like a band. this is really just a designation of the video format, not the music

3.12.20  11:26 pm   When did you learn all of your instruments?

     the phanerozoic eon

3.12.20  11:20 pm   Why are some of the 80s music so beautiful.

     that's just a natural property of music in general

      Is it because of the long reverb on the fat snare, chorus effect on guitars.

     i promise there are ways to use all those things that you might not find so beautiful

      I mean listen to 'Is This Love' by 'White Snake' for example. What makes it the 80s music?

     the only rule is that it needs to be released between 1980 and 1990

3.12.20  11:11 pm   why have i made you my role model

     hopefully because i know what i'm doing

3.12.20  10:56 pm   How do you cope with an addiction to bill wurtz music?

     i am working on developing a treament plan
